tagline: Data-Driven Farming for a Bountiful Harvest

landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need for a smarter harvest
landing.featuresSubtitle: Our platform provides a comprehensive suite of tools to support every stage of your farming cycle.

feature1.title: Yield Prediction
feature1.desc: Forecast crop yields with high accuracy using soil, weather, and historical data.

feature2.title: Fertilizer Plans
feature2.desc: Get precise NPK and micronutrient recommendations tailored to your crops and soil.

feature3.title: Disease Detection
feature3.desc: Instantly identify crop diseases from images and receive actionable treatment advice.

feature4.title: Crop Suggestions
feature4.desc: Discover the most profitable and suitable crops for your next planting season.

testimonials.quote: This platform has revolutionized how I manage my farm. The yield predictions are incredibly accurate, and I've saved a lot on fertilizers.
testimonials.author: Ranjit Singh

testimonials.quote: The disease detection feature saved my tomato crop this season. I uploaded a photo and got an instant, actionable diagnosis. It's a lifesaver!
testimonials.author: Anjali Patil

testimonials.quote: As a young farmer, the crop and fertilizer recommendations are invaluable. It's like having an experienced agronomist in my pocket.
testimonials.author: Karthik Reddy

login.login_to_continue: Login to access personalized farming insights.

register.join_community: Join our community of smart farmers today.

market_prices.no_results: No crops found matching your search.

chatbot.title: AgriBot ðŸŒ±
chatbot.greeting: Hello! I'm AgriBot. How can I help you with your farm today?

query.predict_yield_wheat: My predicted wheat yield is **2.5 tons/acre**.
query.recommend_fertilizer: Based on your latest soil report, we recommend: **Urea: 50kg/acre, DAP: 25kg/acre, Potash: 20kg/acre**.
query.recommend_crop: For the upcoming season, **Mustard (Sarson)** is a highly recommended and profitable crop for your farm.
query.soil_ph_info: Soil pH is a measure of soil acidity or alkalinity. A pH of 7 is neutral. Most crops prefer a pH between 6.0 and 7.5 for optimal nutrient uptake.

chatbot.default_response: I'm sorry, I don't have information on that yet. You could try asking about yield prediction, fertilizer plans, or crop recommendations.

disease.title: Crop Disease Detection
disease.subtitle: Upload an image of the affected plant leaf.
disease.mock_remedy_info: Apply fungicides containing mancozeb or chlorothalonil. Ensure proper spacing between plants for good air circulation and avoid overhead irrigation.

yield.title: Crop Yield Prediction
yield.subtitle: Fill in the details below to get an AI-powered forecast of your crop yield.

crop.title: Crop Recommendation
crop.subtitle: Enter your soil and climate data to find the most suitable crop for your farm.

fertilizer.title: Fertilizer Recommendation
fertilizer.subtitle: Get a precise fertilizer recommendation based on your soil and crop type.

about.title: About Smart Crop Advisory
about.subtitle: Empowering farmers with data-driven technology for a sustainable future.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.title: Bridging the Gap Between Traditional Farming and Modern Technology
mission.text: Our goal is to provide every farmer, regardless of the size of their land, with accessible, affordable, and easy-to-use tools that leverage artificial intelligence. We believe in a future where technology and tradition work hand-in-hand to create a more productive and sustainable agricultural ecosystem.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.value1_text: Our solutions are designed with the farmer's needs and challenges at the forefront.
values.value2_text: We are committed to continuous research and development to bring the best technology to the field.
values.value3_text: We aim to build a strong network of farmers, experts, and labs to share knowledge and grow together.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have a question, feedback, or need support, our team is here to help.
